title: Don't let Rito see this

embed.description: 150%상승이 최대인가봄 마지막 실험영상에 도움을 주신 명캔마스터이 (FAREWLL)님 감사드립니다 이젠 정말 기묘한 5인큐 마무리뿐이야....

body:
First Off, what do you think when I say 'Jhin'
Sniper with low mobility?

Secondly, the video presented is not mine as I didn't get to play Jhin much during ARURF this time let alone record.
Thirdly, the math below is only achievable with the urf buff.
Base Ms (330) + 
Nidalee e (60% as) +
Warwick w (80% as)+
Nunu w (45% as + 12% ms)+
Zilean e (99% ms) +
Jhin Passive (10% ms) +
Full build ({{item:3078}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3094}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3085}} {{item:3046}}) (225% as + 27% ms + 45 ms)+
Attack speed runes (I have 28.8% as)+
Level 18 (as growth at level 18 = 51% as) +
Stormraiders surge passive proc. (40% ms) +
Ghost (45% ms) + 
Urf Buff. (60 ms + 100% increased attack speed) = 489.8 x 2 (2 represent urf buff) + 233% ms + 105 ms
                                                                                     = 979.6% as + 233% ms + 105
                                                                                     = (Jhin passive turns 979.6% as into (97.96 x 4)%ms) + 233% ms + 105 ms
                                                                                     = 391.84% ms + 233% ms + 105 ms
                                                                                     = 624.84% ms + 105 ms
                                                                                     = 624.84/100 x 330 (base ms) + 105 ms
                                                                                     = 2061.972* 2062 ms + 105 ms
                                                                                     = **2,167 ms**
**Jhin** can get **2,167** movement speed on an auto if everything is used. 
That is pretty fast for someone considered to be immobile

replies.body: You know what that's not even annoying that's funny as hell
